path_warning: Important: All paths must contain only English characters, numbers, underscore (_), hyphen (-), or dot (.). No spaces or other languages!
instructions_content:
Instructions:

1. Select video file: Supports MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, FLV, WMV formats
2. Set output directory: Recommended to use an empty folder
3. [Important] All paths must contain only English characters, numbers, underscore (_), hyphen (-), or dot (.). No spaces or other languages!
4. Set frame range:
   - Start Frame: Frame number starting from 0
   - End Frame: Not exceeding total frames-1
5. Click "Start Processing" to begin extraction
6. You can click "Stop Processing" to interrupt at any time

Extracted images will be saved with these rules:
- Automatically create subfolders every 5000 frames (subarea1, subarea2...)
- Images named as frame_00000001.jpg
- Full log recorded in extraction_log.txt
precautions_content:
Precautions:

[Path Requirements]
1. All paths must contain only English letters, numbers, underscore (_), hyphen (-) or dot (.), no spaces or other languages
2. Avoid special characters in paths

[File Handling]
1. Ensure output directory has enough space (recommend at least 5x video file size)
2. Do not modify files in output directory during processing

[Performance]
1. Processing time depends on video length and computer performance

[Other Limitations]
1. Does not support encrypted/DRM protected videos
2. Frame positioning accuracy depends on video codec
3. Check log file when encountering errors

Version: v1.3 | Last Updated: 2025-08-12
confirm_stop: Are you sure you want to stop processing?
invalid_frames: Invalid frame range! Ensure start frame is between 0-{0} and start frame is not greater than end frame
